title: A powerful underrated sequel
review: This is a well made movie that dissapointed a lot of fans me included, we all like happy endings and we don't get it this time around more like a pretty sad conclusion for lieutenant Ripley. The 4th installment wasn't necessary this is basically the end of the story.

title: Do me a favor
review: Go get your popcorn ready, relax and enjoy this big budget comedy sci fi flick, it gets a little boring when they get in the space but is absolutely worthy because of the excellent CGI, Best Michael Bay movie yet
